subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: The Philippines is one of 15 phase 1 countries participating in a collaborative Programme focused on capacity building for climate change over a four-year period. The Overall Programme will strengthen national capacities to do the following: 1) Develop/establish greenhouse gas inventory management systems; 2) Formulate Nationally Appropriate Mitigation Actions (NAMAs) and/or low-emission development strategies (LEDS) in the context of national development; 3) Design MRV systems to support implementation and evaluation of NAMAs and LEDS and 4) Facilitate the design and adoption of mitigation actions by selected industries in a few countries; and 5) Support the design of the associated MRV systems for industrial mitigation measures. The Philippines will focus on outcomes 1 to 3.
subproject.title: PHL: Low Emission CapB Project

title: Philippines: Low Emission Capacity Building Project
